definition: to say hello to/to send one's regards to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: Please say hello to your wife.
And when I said hello to cashiers and clerks, I got better service.
sentences.chinese: 當我向出納員或店員問好時，能得到更優質的服務。

sentences.english: Say hello to Mr. Wang for me.
Please remember me to Dr. King.
Now she and the others say "good morning" when they get into the car.
sentences.chinese: 現在她和其他孩子上車得的時候都會相互問好。

sentences.english: Heidi ran forward to wish good-morning to him and the goats.
sentences.chinese: 海蒂跑上前向他們問好。
請代向史密斯先生問好。

sentences.english: I'm now saying hello to you on the Magic Carpet .
sentences.chinese: 我現在在魔法飛毯上跟你問好。
或者我得說，代你向她問好。

sentences.english: They agreed to say hello to each other every day through QQ, later XuSong crush on music.
sentences.chinese: 他們約定每天通過QQ彼此問好，後來許嵩迷上音樂。

sentences.english: You can stop by to visit your ex-boss and say hi to them or treat them coffee.
sentences.chinese: 可以順道拜訪舊上司，向他問好或請他喝杯咖啡。

sentences.english: This is Grove Lions sayin' hi to you.
sentences.chinese: 這是歌縛梨安，向你問好。

sentences.english: When you meet others first time, you should say "hello" forwardly.
sentences.chinese: 當你與別人初次見面時，你應該主動問好。

sentences.english: Denise came in and said hello to everyone.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼絲進來向每個人問好。

sentences.english: The rude student runs past Mr. Ge without saying 'Hello' to him.
sentences.chinese: 這個粗魯的學生從葛老師身邊跑過，沒向他問好。

sentences.english: A: Please say hello to your family.

definition: to give one's respects/to send a greeting/(fig.) (coll.) to make offensive reference to (somebody dear to the person to whom one is speaking)
to say goodbye/to take one's leave
to chat and laugh/to crack jokes/to banter
to ask about/to make some inquiries/to ask around
easy to deal with/not a problem/(polite answer) you flatter me
